constraints.customMessage: Operation has not succeeded (that has been logged). Please contact support team.

description:
Your tenant is eligible for Grail. For details, see [documentation](https://dt-url.net/n9032kl).

After activation, you will:

* Use Grail storage with custom retention times.
  For details, see [Log buckets and retention](https://dt-url.net/ep234n2) and [Business event bucket assignment](https://dt-url.net/4c034xt)

* Use DQL for data analysis, log metrics, event definition, and processing rules.
  For details, see [Migration to DQL](https://dt-url.net/2s03459).

Your existing log data will not be available after you activate Grail.

Because logs typically contain sensitive data, access to Grail is restricted to administrators. For details, see [account settings](https://dt-url.net/1t039fy).
displayName: Activate Grail for logs and events
